description:
AJKK-09 EMBROIDERED TWISTED SILK 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Twisted silk Trouser: Twisted silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Green

Unfurl like a first leaf of spring in this ethereal sage green ensemble, awakening a sense of natural beauty. The beautifully embroidered shirt transforms into a secret garden, with floral embroidery blossoming in delicate pink threads. These flowers seem to catch the sunlight, thanks to the omnipresence of antique gold and dual-toned zari, shimmering like sunbeams, while scattered gold sequins add a touch of celestial whimsy. The lightly embroidered dupatta evokes a sense of a gentle breeze rustling through newly minted leaves.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on twisted silk
Embroidered front side panel right on twisted silk
Embroidered front side panel left on twisted silk
30" embroidered border for front hemline on twisted silk
30" embroidered back with border on twisted silk
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on twisted silk
2.5 meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on twisted silk
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon with 4 side borders
1.5 meter dyed wide width twisted silk for trouser
